product_name: NiteRider Lightning Bug 120 and Stinger Combo Bike Light Set - 2014 Overstock
long_description: A great choice for around-town riders and commuters, the Lightning Bug 120 and Stinger Combo Bike Light Set features rechargeable batteries and bright LEDs for convenience and safety.
